General.Name: Expensify Inc
General.Description: Expensify, Inc. provides a cloud-based expense management software platform in the United States and internationally. The company offers Expensify, a platform that offers corporate card management, bills payment, invoice generation, payment collection, and travel booking services, as well as track and submit plans for individuals. It serves individuals and corporations, small and midsized businesses, and enterprises. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Portland, Oregon.
General.Address: 401 SW 5th Avenue, Portland, OR, United States, 97204
